attributes.action: Protect the teaching of creationism and other religious beliefs in all schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All major religions should be taught in schools so that our multi-cultural society can be preserved. Children need to learn about other religions so that they can have an understanding of the society in which they live. This is not indoctrination!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect the teaching of creationism and other religious beliefs in all schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14467.asp
